answers.answer: Hey i think if u control it u wil get married. Most of us have problems with our health

I believe there is no reason for you not to be able to get married and enjoy your married life if you will learn to control your diabetes. There is no cure to it yet so all you can do is to do your best to control it and keep your sugar within healthy range. Its not impossible with the right amount of determination and self-discipline.

question: I am 34 and half years old Un married I am insulin dependent diabties diagnosed in 1999 can I get married now if yes then is there any medicine which provides help to enjoy more mariage life.Thanks
title: Can I get Married
